intents.name: Multimodal Interaction
intents.description: Allows users to input text-based symptom descriptions, voice commands, or chat-based queries for medical guidance.
examples: Can I use voice commands to get advice?
How do I chat with the system?

intents.name: Track Healing Progress
intents.description: Compares follow-up images to monitor wound healing and adjusts recommendations based on progress.
examples: How is my wound healing over time?
Can you compare today's image with last week's?
Is my wound getting better or worse?

name: User Interaction and Monitoring
scope: Facilitates multimodal interactions with users, including text, voice, and chat-based queries. Manages continuous wound monitoring by comparing past and present images to track healing progress.
